tasks.description: Task: Review and Verify Assignment Completion

subTasks.description: Task 1.1: Check if all 25 students have submitted their Python assignments
Task 1.2: Verify that each assignment is in .ipynb file format
Task 1.3: Ensure that all assignments are named appropriately

tasks.description: Task: Evaluate and Grade the Assignments

subTasks.description: Task 2.1: Review the code logic and correctness of each assignment
Task 2.2: Check for adherence to recommended coding conventions and best practices
Task 2.3: Assign grades based on the quality and completeness of the assignments

tasks.description: Task: Provide Feedback and Suggestions for Improvement

subTasks.description: Task 3.1: Identify strengths and weaknesses in each student's assignment
Task 3.2: Provide constructive feedback on areas that need improvement
Task 3.3: Suggest ways to enhance coding skills and overcome common errors

tasks.description: Task: Record and Communicate Grades to Students

subTasks.description: Task 4.1: Compile a list of individual grades for each student's assignment
Task 4.2: Prepare personalized grade reports for each student
Task 4.3: Communicate the grades and feedback to the respective students

tasks.description: Design and layout of the website

subTasks.description: Choose a suitable template or design for the website
Create a visually appealing layout for the website
Incorporate branding elements and color scheme
Set up user registration and login system
Implement functionality for users to submit queries or input text
Connect the user inputs to the ChatGpt API for generating responses
Research and select a suitable API for integrating ChatGpt into the website
Implement the API integration on the backend of the website
Handle API requests and responses efficiently
Design a user-friendly interface to display user queries and responses from ChatGpt
Implement a chat-like interface for smooth conversation flow
Include options for users to rate or provide feedback on the responses
Test the website thoroughly to identify and fix any bugs or issues
Optimize the performance and responsiveness of the website
Deploy the website on a reliable hosting platform for public access and usage
Choose a suitable template or design layout
Create a color scheme and select appropriate fonts
Design the logo and other visual elements
Create a home page with a clear navigation menu
Design individual web pages for different sections or features of the website
Implement appropriate buttons, links, and forms for user interaction
Select an API or library to integrate ChatGpt with the website
Configure the ChatGpt to handle user queries and generate responses
Implement a user interface for the chatbot to appear on the website
Conduct thorough testing to ensure all website functionalities work correctly
Identify and fix any bugs or issues in the website's code or design
Test the ChatGpt integration for smooth conversation flow and accuracy
Choose a suitable web hosting provider to deploy the website
Configure the website to be accessible online
Regularly update and maintain the website to ensure compatibility and security.
